column6:
Gather 'round, lil' doggies. Ol' Ben Grimm's done been hijacked from our time an' shot back to the Old West, where varmints and vandals ruled the day! Even if Benjy teams up with one of the past's greatest heroes, STEAM RIDER, can he manage to hightail his way back to the present? Crack that whip! ,2008,1
WHOO-PTCH!
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | artist:Ronan Cliquet | penciller (cover):Leonard Kirk | writer:Joe Lansdale | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Nate Piekos | inker:Amilton Santos
